name: Dubai Travel Package
packageInclude: All Drink Included,Insurance.Tour Guide,Lunch In Restaurant,All Ticket Museum

overview.Day 1: DUBAI: Arrive at Dubai airport and proceed towards the Immigration counter for your Eye scan and Immigration formalities . After getting the stamping done on your UAE tourist visa , and Immigration clearance proceed towards the Arrival lounge where you will be met by our Airport representative who will guide you towards the transport and you will be transferred to your hotel in Dubai. Afternoon free for relaxation. Dhow Cruise – The tour representative will arrange for a pick up from hotel's lobby around 1900 Hrs. for your Dhow Cruise . Today you will enjoy a true portrait of the New & the Old Dubai while sailing in an exclusively designed Dhow made of beautiful teak wood . Experience a true Arabian hospitality , relaxing atmosphere , good music and a delightful international buffet cuisine . The dinner will be served with complimentary soft drink and mineral water . Drop back at the hotel around 2130 hrs. . Over night at the hotel .
overview.Day 2: DUBAI: Breakfast at the hotel. Dubai City Tour – The tour representative will arrange for a pick up from hotel's lobby between 0930 - 1000 Hrs. The tour will start from a stopover at Jumeirah Mosque followed by a short visit to Jumeriah Beach where you can click photographs from outside of the world famous Burj Al Arab Hotel - This sail shaped stunning Iconic hotel is a symbol of modern Dubai. There after a drive along the Palm Jumeirah which is claimed to be an eighth wonder of the world being a man made island. Take a look at the magnificent architecture of Deira Towers. Visit the Dubai Museum and the Textile Market with a final stop at the Dubai Gold Souk with its enormous collection of shops and remarkable variety of goods at exceptionally reasonable prices. Drop back at the hotel.
overview.Day 3: DUBAI: Breakfast at the hotel. Day free to explore the city on your own or opt for an Optional Full Day Tour To Abu Dhabi ( at an extra cost ) . Start with Abu Dhabi City Tour and discover the Wonders of Abu Dhabi , the capital of the UAE which has a breath taking modern architecture based on Islamic themes . Tour starts with the magnificent Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultab Al Nahyan Mosque which is the 3rd largest mosque in the world followed by a short drive to Al Hosn Palace which is the only palace in UAE that permits visitors . A stop over at Emirates Palace Hotel for a photo shoot with a final stop over at Marina Mall to enjoy fabulous shopping.

sightseeing.desc: You can take an extended tour to Dubai to explore all the undiluted wonders of the land or you can enjoy a short vacation for a couple of days to soak in the splendor and excitement with your family. Dubai has many wonderful places to explore, which are unique and enjoy an unprecedented place among most of the other tourist destinations. Enjoy a fun-filled visit to Dubai, explore the following attractions: Amazing theme and amusements parks of Dubai; Dubai Ski world; Visit the only 7-star property of the world, Al Burj Khalifa; the amazing Palm Islands; enjoy an adventurous streak by going on desert safaris, sand surfing and enjoying some exotic belly dancing in desert camps on the famous sand dunes of Dubai; the historic site of Al Fahidi district; the famous Dubai Mall- considered to be the biggest in the world and many other malls of Dubai; Jumeraih beach resort; the tallest structure in the world- Burj Khalifa; Universal Studios Dubai; Dubai Zoo; Dubai Museum; Dubai Creek; Gold Souk; Wollongong Beach; Jebel Ali Beach; Dubai Dolphinarium; Hatta Rock Pools; take a cruise in the sea or a short excursion to Abu Dhabi, the capital of United Arab Emirates. Dubai holiday packages take care of all your traveling needs right from booking tickets, making reservations in good hotels, taking care of your local transportation including a tourist guide.

review.title: Superb
review.name: Ravi
review.desc: I am grateful to Myoho Holidays for planning a great holiday trip for my parents.
